ygData.subject: DIE QWEST DIE!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyone knows any nuclear launch codes? I need em for Qwest s demise. Logo, Squizzy is at the CF, not the Ark. The CF is the Maximal base, a battle cruiser,

Subject: DIE QWEST DIE!!!!
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Windows AOL sub 110
From: Yanshosh@...

Anyone knows any nuclear launch codes? I need 'em for Qwest's demise.

Logo, Squizzy is at the CF, not the Ark. The CF is the Maximal base, a battle 
cruiser, and it probably wouldn't have collapsing walls or rooms.... I'll go 
along with it if you insist, but its very strange.

And everyone at the Ark, there a battle going on!!

::Ramulus/Slayer/Smokescreen/Proto::

Seeing bots fly toward the Ark, and his scanners reporting that they were 
Predacons, Proto opens fire, aiming at Destructor with one gun and Cerebrus 
with the other.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramulus swears, watching bot after bot aproach the Ark, and Proto open fire. 
He'd have to talk to the bot about opening fire like that, if they survived 
this that is.

Aiming carefully, he fires a few shots at Destructor.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Seeing Ramulus and Proto open fire, Smokescreen follows suit, firing on 
Destructor.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Slayer growls as Lunarping tackles him, Slayer's jetpack doubling its power 
and sending the two bots flying up into the air, Slayer firing two shots from 
his shoulders at point-blank range.
